UserInterface

Class StorageViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserInterface.StorageViewController

  • public class StorageViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the Access FXML file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StorageViewController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Checks which of the radio buttons is selected and depending on that calls the addProduct method with the parameter representing the selected radio button.
      void addToStore(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Checks the chosen product from the table and calls the addToStore method on the view model with the chosen product as parameter.
      void checkOrders(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Opens the openOrders scene through the viewhandler
      void deleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Checks which product is selected from the table, and calls the deleteProduct method on the view model with the chosen product as parameter.
      void goBack(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Opens the openMainAdmin scene through the viewhandler.
      void init(StorageViewModel storageVM, ViewHandler viewHandler)
      Initializer method that binds some of the textfields and labels found in the fxml file to the view model
      void radioAccess(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Sets a typeF textField and consoleLabel label invisible
      void radioConsole(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Sets a typeF textField and consoleLabel label invisible
      void radioVideoGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Sets a typeF textField and consoleLabel label visible

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(StorageViewModel storageVM,
                 ViewHandler viewHandler)
        Initializer method that binds some of the textfields and labels found in the fxml file to the view model
        Parameters:
        storageVM - StorageViewModel
        viewHandler - ViewHandler

      • addToStore

        public void addToStore(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Checks the chosen product from the table and calls the addToStore method on the view model with the chosen product as parameter. If there is no chosen product the parameter given is null.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ActionEvent from the GUI.

      • addProduct

        public void addProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Checks which of the radio buttons is selected and depending on that calls the addProduct method with the parameter representing the selected radio button. 2 = console, 1 = video game, 3 = accessory.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ActionEvent from the GUI.

      • deleteProduct

        public void deleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Checks which product is selected from the table, and calls the deleteProduct method on the view model with the chosen product as parameter. If there is no product chosen it shows an error message in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ActionEvent from the GUI.

      • checkOrders

        public void checkOrders(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Opens the openOrders scene through the viewhandler
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ActionEvent from the GUI.

      • goBack

        public void goBack(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Opens the openMainAdmin scene through the viewhandler.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ActionEvent from the GUI.

      • radioVideoGame

        public void radioVideoGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Sets a typeF textField and consoleLabel label visible
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ActionEvent from the GUI.

      • radioConsole

        public void radioConsole(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Sets a typeF textField and consoleLabel label invisible
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ActionEvent from the GUI.

      • radioAccess

        public void radioAccess(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Sets a typeF textField and consoleLabel label invisible
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ActionEvent from the GUI.
